channel.title: Submit bid for IATI Data Use Fund
channel.description:
The International Aid Transparency Initiative (IATI) is inviting proposals to deliver an [inventory of IATI training materials and data use tools](https://procurement-notices.undp.org/view_notice.cfm?notice_id=66129) under IATI's Data Use Fund (deadline 19 June).
UNDP/IATI is seeking to contract a service provider to create an inventory of existing training materials on using IATI data and conduct a gap analysis to understand what additional resources are required to support data users.
Interested and qualified service providers are encouraged to submit their bid according the [Requests for Proposals (RfPs)](https://procurement-notices.undp.org/view_notice.cfm?notice_id=66129) by **Friday 19 June 2020**.
See full information on the RFP on the [UNDP Procurement website](https://procurement-notices.undp.org/view_notice.cfm?notice_id=66129). For more information please contact Anna Whitson, IATI Outreach and Partnerships Specialist at [anna.whitson@undp.org](mailto:anna.whitson@undp.org).

item.title: Submit bid for IATI Data Use Fund
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
Please note that the deadline for bids has now been extended to Friday 19 June 2020.

The original post has been edited to reflect this.

Read full topic
